data.title: OSPREI: Sun-to-Earth (or satellite) CME simulator
data.name: OSPREI
data.description: Fully coupled system of ForeCAT-based models

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "The final step for the magnetic background is to run `PFSS.py`. This script pulls in a date string at the python call, just to find the correct text file containing the harmonic coefficients. Within t"
"OSPREI is a suite of models that simulate the Sun-to-Earth (or satellite) behavior of CMEs. `OSPREI.py` is the main function, and is called by passing a text file to it on the command line."
"OSPREI runs ForeCAT for coronal CME deflection and rotation, ANTEATR (PARADE) for interplanetary CME propagation, expansion, and deformation, and FIDO for in situ profiles."
